add_section_help: Add a section to the end of the unit
append_trueFalse: Add question with true or false answer
check_content_help: Check if the content contains any errors
clear_content_help: Completely remove the contents of the unit
generating_preview_text: Your preview is being generated, please wait.
multiple_answer_questions_help: This is the number of multiple answer questions that will appear in the unit
preview_generated_text: Your preview is ready. If your browser does not redirect you to the preview, click on the link below:
preview_video_help: Preview the interactive video in the player
question_bank_help_1: By clicking on the following buttons you can add questions from your question bank to your evaluation unit.
question_bank_help_2: You can create a random unit by clicking on the following button
question_groups_help: Questions belonging to one of these groups can be selected
question_search_help: These questions are the result of the search by tag
question_tags_help: Questions with at least one of these tags can be selected
question_type_help: Type that the question must have.
save_content_help: Save the content of the unit
selcted_questions_help: The selected questions are the ones you want to be added into your evaluation unit
single_answer_questions_help: This is the number of multiple answer question that will appear in the unit
trueFalse_questions_help: This is the number of true false questions that will appear in the unit
